Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
When I see a lot of yellow, it cheers me up.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
...Red brings out something in the bottom of my
heart.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I love what you've done with the place! Reminds
me of summer.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
This place looks like my old hometown. You've
got a good eye!

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Is there loot in this thing? Should I stab it or
something?

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
...I bet this pot would fetch a pretty penny...

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Wh-what IS this statue, and why's it keep staring
at me?!

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Wh-what IS this statue, and why's it keep staring
at me?!

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
*sob* I don't know why, but every time I look at
this statue, I cry...

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
If I threw in my axe, would a fairy give me a gold
one?

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Time for a little fishing... Oh, there's no fish,
huh?

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Looks like the perfect spot to make a speech.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I used to make these all the time when I was
little.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Wh-what in the...?! Is that an ogre face?!

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I bought my son some souvenirs while I was
visiting here. Hope he likes them.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
There're some good-quality products around
here. I'll come by again for sure.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I bought my son some souvenirs. He likes
anything that's made here.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I think I went a little overboard on the souvenirs
for my kid...

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Hey, is this town famous for anything? I'm
looking for some nice souvenirs.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
Hmm... What should I buy for my son...?

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I'm a traveler. Just happened to wander into
town.
<PAGE>
I hate to say it, but it's kind of depressing here,
isn't it?

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
What is it about this little town that brings
people in? Tell me so I know which souvenirs to
buy.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I've always been a drifter, but these days, I keep
ending up here.

<NAME_MOB_ADOLF>
I used to think of this town as a rest stop. Now,
it's my favorite destination.
<PAGE>
It's amazing when you realize how famous this
town's gotten.
